campaign.description: This is a campaign that displays a landing banner, with a 25% discount on all suits and default sorting rule of top selling suits.
This a campaign for the Mens Dress Shirts Category offering a specific banner as well as a 20% off dress shirts promotion, and a custom sort rule of product name ascending
